text:
You traverse a narrow walkway suspended above a lake of molten iron. The heat scorches your lungs, and the moans of long-dead smiths echo from below. Gears the size of towers grind slowly in the dark, powered by something that still breathes.

Chains dangle from the ceiling like metal vines, each one marked with a name—some still glowing faintly. Halfway across, you see your own name carved into one. Beneath it, a single word: 'Forged.'
lore: This forge was once used to birth living weapons—souls bound in flame and steel. Those who crossed unmarked were safe. Those whose names appear… were chosen long before they arrived.
